name: The Loops (wave 2)
description:
read!!!!

arrows to move

the black head that randomly appears on your screen is so called "looker" he will appear on your screen click on him he will go away he will be back...

when you hear a clamble noise crouch with down arrow until the eye called"seeker" is gone 

the ghost that randomly appears on your screen is called "wait" wait until hes gone he will not attack you

the hand you see is called "snatch" when you see it crouch until its gone

the ink circle with a red pupil is called"r987e" or "red eyes"  is a demon.it watches everything if you will hear a snap if you do DONT MOVE or you will die
